known_issues: Build/configuration error encountered during build; may require Caffeine team assistance

existing_features.title: Use the uploaded image(s) as a visible "profile background" in the existing UI by applying one of the uploaded images as the background for the Doctors page doctor profile cards (e.g., a banner area at the top of each doctor card or behind an avatar area), ensuring it is responsive and does not reduce text readability.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add the provided image as the profile background

Add the two user-uploaded images (Screenshot_2026-02-04-17-14-58-73_1c337646f29875672b5a61192b9010f9-1.jpg and unnamed.webp) to the frontend as static assets with their original filenames so they can be referenced by the UI.

projectName: Add uploaded image as profile background
